subheader.name: Subheader Revamp
subheader.description: Adds significant functionality and customisability to the subheader.

legacy-timetable.name: Legacy Timetable
legacy-timetable.description: Reverts the timetable to the old version.

tab-title.name: Tab Title
tab-title.description: Adds the current page to the tab title.

homepage-switcher.name: Homepage Switcher
homepage-switcher.description: When the Schoolbox logo is clicked, the user it taken to an existing homepage tab (when available).

scroll-period.name: Scroll Period
scroll-period.description: Scrolls to the current period on the timetable.

timetable-labels.name: Timetable Labels
timetable-labels.description: Labels the day of the week from numbers to the actual day
